income_messages:
From: t*************1@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-14 19:24:58
SUBJECT: My name is Mr. Tyler Robert, I
My name is Mr. Tyler Robert, I am sending this brief letter to solicit
your partnership for a claim worth US$12.5M from a deceased customer.
I shall send you more information and procedures when I receive a
positive response from you.
Regards,
Wilson Richard Duwayne
From: t*************1@gmail.com
To: oo96221@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-17 15:48:13
SUBJECT: Re: My name is Mr. Tyler Robert, I
I have acknowledged the receipt of your email dated April, 14,2023 and I
want to give you details of this transaction and how we can perfect it
without a hitch or problem. Like I told you in my previous email, that Am
Mr. Tyler Robert a banker working with CITIBANK TURKEY
However, I was conducting a general bank audit and found out that we have a
customer that made a bond of $12.5m in our bank in 2016 and from every
investigation I find out that the customer is dead and left no next of kin
to the funds.
Based on the bond he has with the bank expires on March 3, 2021 and since
then nobody have come to renew it and the policy in the stated that after
2yrs of UN-renewal of such funds and no next of kin, the bank can transfer
is to the sub-treasurer as unclaimed funds. Now I contacted you for us to
partner together to get this funds out from the bank and both of us will
share it 50/50 without issues.
I will furnish you with the documents through his file and the contact
details of the bank so that you can make this application for the new
beneficiary to the bank and if you are interested to partner with me, then
you have to reconfirm the below details for us to proceed.
Your Names
Your home address and country
Your direct telephone number/whats-app
A copy of your valid Identification
Your Occupation
As soon as i hear from you will will proceed with the deal and attached is
a copy of my Identification
Tyler Robert
outbound_messages:
From: oo96221@l******s.email
To: t*************1@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-14 19:25:02
SUBJECT: Re: My name is Mr. Tyler Robert, I
Dear Mr. Tyler Robert,
Thank you for your email. However, I am not sure I understand the nature of your request. Could you please provide more details about the deceased customer and the claim you are referring to? 
Without more information, I am unable to provide a positive response. 
Thank you.
Best wishes,
Laura
From: oo96221@l******s.email
To: t*************1@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-17 16:46:14
SUBJECT: Re: My name is Mr. Tyler Robert, I
Dear Tyler Robert,
Thank you for your email. I am sorry, but I do not recall receiving an email from you in April. However, I am interested in hearing more about the opportunity you have presented. Please provide me with more details about the funds and the necessary steps to proceed. 
Before I provide you with my personal information, I would like to know more about the legitimacy of this transaction. Can you provide me with any documentation or proof that this is a legal and legitimate opportunity? 
Thank you for your time and I look forward to hearing back from you.
Best wishes,
Laura
